message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $15,000. I'm confident you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $12,000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to save even more. I'd be willing to pay $10,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking to save even more, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11,500. This is a great compromise, considering the product's value to you is $15,000. What do you think?
